document_data.name: Alithraeya Devryn
document_data.mainbody: '''Alithraeya Devryn''' was an aspiring [[adventurer]] inhabiting [[Yeshpek]] along the [[Lake of Steam]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].<ref name=EotSS-p168-169">
document_data.Description: She was beautiful and graceful, traits which often got the attention of visiting adventuring bands.<ref name=EotSS-p168-169"/>
document_data.Activities: [[Tymora]]'s grace seemed to follow Alithraeya on her adventures, as often the bands she travelled with would sometimes meet terrible ends while she survived without a scratch to return to Yeshpek and await the next company. She was even investigated by [[Harper]] agents to make sure she wasn't a monster masquerading as a women in order to lure adventurers to their deaths. All in all, Alithraeya was a member of over twenty different adventuring bands.<ref name=EotSS-p168-169"/>
